items.title: PCOS
items.description: Polycystic ovarian syndrome is a hormonal disorder affecting many women in the reproductive age group and is characterized by anovulation, state of insulin resistance and production of excess male hormones

sections.title: SYMPTOMS
sections.description:
• Irregular periods is the most common symptom.
  • Excessive facial and body hair (hirsutism )
  • severe acne
  • male pattern baldness (alopecia)
  • Acanthosis nigricans – dark, velvety skin patches present over back of the neck or axillary areas.
  • Obesity – commonly seen along with PCOS

sections.title: Diagnosis
sections.description:
• Complete history and examination
  • Blood investigation
  • GTT
  • lipid profile
  • serum testosterone
  • FSH
  • LH
  • AMH
  • Ultrasound pelvis- to assess the size and morphology of the ovaries

sections.title: Complications
sections.description:
• Sub fertility
  • Increased risk of miscarriages
  • Type 2 diabetes
  • Sleep apnea
  • Hypertension
  • Endometrial Cancer

sections.title: Treatment
sections.description: • Weight loss it is the main treatment in PCOS as it improves the hormonal imbalance and decreases insulin resistance.

sections.title: Medical Management
sections.description:
• Regularization of periods – OCP, Progesterone
  • Ovulation Induction drugs
  • Insulin sensitisers like metformin

items.title: PRE MATURE OVARIAN FAILURE
items.description: A condition where there is a loss of normal function of ovaries before the age of 40

sections.title: SYMPTOMS
sections.description:
• Irregular or missed periods
  • Infertility
  • Hot flushes
  • Night sweats
  • Vaginal dryness
  • Decreased sexual desire

sections.title: Causes
sections.description:
• chromosomal defects like – mosaic Turners
  • Toxins – chemotherapy and radiation therapy can induce damage to the ovaries
  • Autoimmune diseases
  • Unknown Factors

sections.title: Diagnosis
sections.description:
• History and physical examination
  • Blood Investigation – testing of hormones like FSH, LH, AMH, estradiol
  • Ultrasound pelvis to assess the size of ovaries

sections.title: Treatment
sections.description:
• Donor egg programme in those desiring to have a child
  • Hormone replacement therapy in those who have completed child bearing
